attributes.action: Continous and proven speech of HATE crime should result in deportation.
attributes.additional_details:
Hate crime is a prejudice-motivated crime.

The perpetrator(s) will target individuals/groups e.g. such those of a different sex, ethnicity, disability, language, nationality, physical appearance, religion, gender identity or sexual orientation.

Where hate crime can be proven, I believe that in order to protect the United Kingdom and their people, the perpetrator(s) should not be allowed to continue to live here. 

The British people want to live in a peaceful Country.
attributes.background: Any individual/group proven to continiously speak of hate for the British nation should be deported back to their native Country. This decision should be agreed by 3 judges and the person(s) should never to be allowed back to the UK. If found to have dual-nationality, their passport is to be removed
